attributes.additional_details:
churchs are having  70+ people. Pubs have 50+ people every day.

So why should weddings be limited to 30 people? 

You have more chance of catching something on a night out at the pub with strangers then you have with a wedding with nothing but family!
attributes.background:
Stop the wedding guest limit.

Churchs and pubs do not have a limit to how many people they can have so why should weddings?

Is this completely unfair
